main event: A witness observed a single silvery, disc-shaped object approximately 40-50 feet long in Athens County, Ohio on April 26, 1962.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 10-15 minutes,The object was able to hover, ascend, descend, and move side to side,The object was described as being silvery in color and disc shaped, Physical specimens or debris were collected and forwarded, A conversation was noted between the Sheriff's office and Wright-Patterson Air Force Base regarding the sighting.
witness description: the anonymous observer who reported the sighting
